name: MODIFYING_GRP
description: Table for storing modifying user, instant and acknowledged instant.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MODIFYING_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who modified the order.

columns.name: MODIFYING_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MOD_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when an inpatient order is modified.

columns.name: MOD_ACK_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when a modified order is acknowledged.
